## Iteration

### for loops

Get a df

```{r}
df = data_frame(
  a = rnorm(20),
  b = rnorm(20),
  c = rnorm(20),
  d = rnorm(20)
)
```

Define a function
```{r}
z_score = function(x) {
  
  z = mean(x) / sd(x)
  z
  
}
```

apply that function

```{r}
z_score(df[[1]])
z_score(df[[2]])
z_score(df[[3]])
z_score(df[[4]])
```

write a for loop!!!

```{r}
output = vector("list", length = 4)

for (i in 1:4) {
  
  output[[i]] = z_score(df[[i]])
  
}

output
```
